title: Dealing With Technical Debt
description:
The rails project I’m talking about is over three years old and has seen commits from 27 developers in that period. These developers were both co-workers, freelancers, off-shore developers and designers of different levels of expertise.
Technical Debt Inventory Needless to say, as most projects of this size and age, this one has plenty of technical debt. Let’s make an inventory.
The test suite takes approximately eighty minutes to run. These are all RSpec tests, including features.

title: The Next Mission
description: Slides for the brief talk that I gave at a Harvard seminar on privacy and user data organized by John Taysom last week.
